title: project border mishap
body: this is mainly my stupidity that brought me here, but i was really hyped for the new project vayne skin and i really wanted the border and everything. although i thought you got it when you bought the skin. i didnt realize you had to buy the top tier project mission thing. i had enough for it but i spent it on the project shards and orbs. is there some way to reverse this or am i stuck with my stupid mistake for ever...

replies.body: You could submit a ticket to support and see if they will reverse it, but I'm pretty sure this one will be on you since the reward was labelled "Project Hunters Icon and Borders".
